room_title: Escape room "Wizard’s Workshop" by Hidden Puzzle Rooms in Minneapolis - St. Paul
room_address: 1935 County Road B2 West Suite 75 Roseville, MN 55113
room_description: The Wizard Stone runs the Wizard’s Workshop and you are her apprentices. In your time as a student, you have studied many things: enchanted weapons, fairies, mystic plants, potions and magical beasts. Hopefully, you have studied well as it is time for your final exam! The Wizard Stone has taken your wands and she will be gone for one hour. You must find the clues and open each of the five locks keeping you from your wands. Good luck, Apprentices. You have one hour.
